entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers late this evening and overnight. Local smoke. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 6 May 2023
